summary.span: 命名空间提供用于生成构成命令树的表达式的类。

span.span: The namespace provides classes to build expressions that make up a command tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命令树是查询的对象模型表示形式，可用于表示在 ADO.NET Entity Data Model (EDM) 和存储元数据中查询、更新、插入及删除命令。A command trees is an object model representation of a query that can be used to represent query, update, insert, and delete commands in the ADO.NET Entity Data Model (EDM) and storage metadata.
